body.p: An entity that elects to apply this Standard shall disclose information that enables users to assess:

li.p: the nature of, and the risks associated with, the rate regulation that establishes the price(s) that the entity can charge customers for the goods or services it provides; and
the effects of that rate regulation on its financial position, financial performance and cash flows.
